rules.text: We are a real-identity server. This is why our members authenticate with LinkedIn. If you prefer to remain anonymous, please consider joining another server.

Treat other members with respect, be polite and show empathy. 
Don’t overwhelm the discussion. 
Be mindful of spelling and formatting. 
Never write anything you wouldn't say aloud in real life.

Be open and seek to understand opinions that are different from yours.
Encourage each other's input and don't forget to validate other people's contributions.

Help make our community a safe space. 
Don't post or engage with NSFW content (including nudity). 
Don’t post or engage with the sole purpose of stirring controversy. 
Report any spammy behavior, such as unhelpful and unsolicited commercial outreach.

Don’t post or engage with incorrect or misleading content, including manipulated media.
Don’t post or engage with content that encourages or results in violence or physical harm, including health misinformation.

Illegal activities, hate speech, bullying, cancel mobs, harassment, sexual solicitation, threats, or discrimination (including racism, sexism, homophobia, and transphobia) will result in an immediate ban.
